Package stochasticSimulation

Class Observation

  • java.lang.Object
    • stochasticSimulation.DeterministicEvent
      • stochasticSimulation.Observation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Event

    class Observation
extends DeterministicEvent
    The Observation class is a subclass of DeterministicEvent. It's simulation causes the current state of the StochaticSimulation to be printed to the console. This implementation of the observation assumes a shortest path problem.
    Author:
    Manuel Serra

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected int bestCost
      An int with the cost of the best path found so far.
      protected boolean goalReached
      A boolean that tells if the goal has been reached during the simulation (true) or not (false).
      protected static int obsCounter
      A counter of observations has to be set to static.
      protected java.util.List<Point> shortestPath
      The list of points that represents the best path found in the simulation, so far.
      protected StochasticSimulation sim
      A deterministic event may be happening in a stochastic simulation.

      • Fields inherited from class stochasticSimulation.DeterministicEvent

        time

      • Observation

        Observation​(boolean goalReached,
            java.util.List<Point> path,
            int bestCost)
        Constructor for an Observation object.
        Parameters:
        goalReached - a boolean telling whether the goal has been reached or not.
        path - a list of Points representing the best path found so far in the simulation.
        bestCost - the cost of the best path found so far in the simulation.

      • Observation

        Observation​(boolean goalReached,
            java.util.List<Point> path,
            int bestCost,
            StochasticSimulation sim)
        Constructor for an Observation event taking place in a stochastic simulation.
        Parameters:
        goalReached - a boolean telling whether the goal has been reached or not.
        path - a list of Points representing the best path found so far in the simulation.
        bestCost - the cost of the best path found so far in the simulation.
        sim - the StochasticSimulation where the Observation will take place.
